title: Validating Web-Based Educational Effectiveness: Real-Time Online Social Sector Software Training

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational social science theories and computer application skills
context.additional_context: Practical skill-based learning of social sector data analysis software.

learning_goals: Learners can perform basic functions of social-sector software with 80% accuracy through web-based training.
Learners complete 90% of complex data analysis tasks through instructor-learner interactions in real-time online environments.
Learners write and submit a self-assessment report on the effectiveness of web-based training during formative evaluation.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
